title: RHOBH: Dirty Diana
description:
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills reunion kicks off with the usual blend of hypocrisy, denial, and Jamie Lee Curtis. And, as an added touch, several unflattering pumpkin portraits!

This is a Crappens on Demand recap, which means you can watch us as we record the show here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/73271893?pr=true
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
